entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Campbellton

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
